Question: On 4 March 2012, this person won the 2012 Russian presidential elections in the first round, with 63.6% of the vote.
Hints: Western observers and organisations have also voiced criticism of this person's leadership.
This person earned Master of Sports (Soviet and Russian sport title) in judo in 1975 and in sambo in 1973.
This person was also previously the Chairman of United Russia political party.
